3: It's too quiet up the stairs.
Do you remember what happened to the Suzaku squad?
Suzaku? Ah, those who got destroyed by Ascendants... or so the logs say...
That Ascendant is familiar with Construct body structures. It knows how to destroy our parts and modules effectively, and can even modify Constructs into unique Corrupted.
It is highly possible that the Ascendant can modify Constructs into other forms, or even cause them to send false signals, all while maintaining their vital signals.
We'd better be mentally prepared for... whatever's coming.
No enemies found... All Constructs here...
They're still alive, and not corrupted.
But then why aren't they talking?
